author: Krystal Johnson
title: Timothy and Brittany: Husband s heartwarming gender reveal surprise Yahoo7 Be - Yahoo7
text:
Share Timothy and Brittany: Husband s heartwarming gender reveal surprise Yahoo7 Be - Yahoo7 
A couple held a gender reveal party for family and friends and halfway through the husband unzips his hoodie to reveal a heartwarming surprise for all. Tear-worthy gender reveal UP NEXT VIDEO Brittany and Timothy stun their friends with gender reveal party. Source: Deep Water Videos/Vimeo Tear-worthy gender reveal 
Timothy and Brittany have a baby due in May 2017 and they held the party at their Ontario home complete with cupcakes, balloons, ginger bread men, popcorn and a betting sheet for those wanting to guess the gender, Little Things reported . Timothy and Brittany released blue balloons to reveal they were having a boy. Source: Deep Water Films 
However, they left out one vital piece of information that shocked the crowd and brought tears everyone's eyes. 
Together, they opened a box and out flew two bunches of blue balloons - revealing they were having a boy! 
In the next breath, Timothy turns to the guests and says, “thank you for coming from so far away. And I think this is probably the best way to say it.” Timothy turns to the guests and reveals they are having twins! Source: Deep Water Films The reaction from friends and family was magical and one of pure joy and surprise. Source: Deep Water Films 
The father-to-be unzips his hoodie and reveals a very special message printed across his T-shirt and the crowds reaction is sure get those tear ducts flowing! 
Deep Water Films created and shared the magical video that captured the pure joy, excitement and surprise in the room that day. 
The couple embraced as everyone cheered and Brittany had tears pouring from her eyes. Pure love and joy! Source: Deep Water Films Baby's gender revealed by father's hair color UP NEXT
